    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Normalizacija podatkovnih baz</string>
            <string language="en">Normalization of databases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Normalisierung der Datenbanken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Normalisation des bases de données</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Normalization das bases de dados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Normalizzazione delle basi di dati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κανονικοποίηση των βάσεων δεδομένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Normalización de bases de datos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o normalizaciji podatkovnih baz v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: normalizacija, funkcionalna odvisnost, postopek normalizacije.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about normalization of databases, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: normalization, functional dependency, process of normalization.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">normalizacija</string>
            <string language="en">normalization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">podatkovna baza</string>
            <string language="en">database</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">postopek</string>
            <string language="en">procedure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odvisnost</string>
            <string language="en">dependence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Normalisierung der Datenbanken, des
Teils Ematerialien für Informatik und der Informatik. 
Kapitelinhalt: Normalisierung, Funktionsabhängigkeit, 
Prozeß der Normalisierung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de la normalisation des bases 
de données, de la partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et de 
l'informatique. Contenu de chapitre : normalisation, 
dépendance fonctionnelle, processus de la normalisation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre o normalization das bases de 
dados, da parte dos e-materiais para a informática de e do 
informatics. Índices do capítulo: normalization, 
dependência funcional, processo do normalization.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa normalizzazione delle basi di dati
di facente parte i e-materiali per informatica e di informatica. 
Soddisfare di capitolo: normalizzazione, dipendenza 
funzionale, processo di normalizzazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για την κανονικοποίηση των βάσεων δεδομένων, 
μέρος των ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: κανονικοποίηση, λειτουργική 
εξάρτηση, διαδικασία της κανονικοποίησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre la normalización de bases de 
datos, de la parte de los e-materiales para la informática y de la 
informática. Contenido del capítulo: normalización, 
dependencia funcional, proceso de la normalización.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Normalisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenbank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozedur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abhängigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
